project.name: Automate With Selenium
project.description:
This is Didum Abraham's Project Negative One at Revature's online training program. This project demonstrates how to setup and configure the necessary files needed to run a Maven Project in Spring Tool Suite 4 (STS4) with Selenium WebDriver. This selenium webdriver enables backend tasks automation in the browser.
Remarks: 1. There are two Maven projects linked here 1.1. my-calculator-app 1.2. project-negative-one 2. Fork the repository (didum-gitrep) on GitHub, save to a location of your choice on your local drive 3. Open the projects in Spring Tool Suite 4 4. Go to my-calculator-app - src/main/java - CalcApplication.java ... right-click/Run As/Java Application ... this starts up the server 5. Next, go to project-negative-one - src/main/java - AutomateWithSelenium.java ... right-click/Run As/Java Application ... this uses Selenium to automate tasks in the browser
